tennisExperience.title: US Open Tennis Assistant Producer
tennisExperience.description: Coordinated player interviews, managed tournament logistics, and ensured smooth operations during one of tennis's biggest events.
highlights: Directly interviewed top-ranked ATP and WTA players
Assisted live television content production with research
Coordinated with media teams and tournament officials
Managed player interview schedules and logistics
Set up lighting, sound, and camera equipment for interviews
